烕字的基本解释

烕
miè
古同“灭”。（ａ．熄灭。ｂ．灭亡）。

烕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［miè］
［《廣韻》許劣切，入薛，曉。］
［《集韻》莫列切，入薛，明。］
“滅1”的古字。
灭亡；熄灭。

烕字的康熙字典解释

【巳集中】【火字部】　烕； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页670第12
【唐韻】許劣切【集韻】【韻會】翾劣切，?音?。【說文】?滅也。从火戌。火死于戌。陽氣至戌而盡。【詩·小雅】褒姒烕之。　又【集韻】莫列切，音滅。火滅也。【唐詩古音考】滅，與烕義同而字異。?字原作戌下火。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Collection] [Fire Word Department] 　烕; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 670 No. 12
[Tang Yun] Xu Xiqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Yiqie, "Yin". [Said the text]? Mie also. From Huoxu. The fire died of Xu. Yang Qi is exhausted. [Poetry·Xiaoya] Complimentary.　[Jiyun] Morieche, the sound is off. The fire is also extinguished. [A textual research on ancient sounds of Tang poems] Extinguish, with the same meaning but different characters. ? The original character was written on fire.
